taxon_name.authority: (Hampe ex Müller Hal.) Brotherus in H. G. A. Engler and K. Prantl

place_of_publication.publication_title: in H. G. A. Engler and K. Prantl, Nat. Pflanzenfam.

bio:treatment.description: Plants 1–4 cm. Stem leaves linear-lanceolate, 1.5–4 mm; margins recurved, toothed or entire proximally, toothed or notched distally; basal laminal cells yellowish, walls thick; distal cells 9–11 µm, slightly obscured by papillae, papillae elliptic, small. Sexual condition dioicous; perichaetial leaves elongate, narrow, base subsheathing, apex long-pointed. Seta 1.5–2 mm. Capsule immersed to emergent, 1.2–1.6 mm; operculum conic-apiculate, less than diam. of capsule. Spores 10–15 µm.
crevices of neutral to acidic rock

bio:treatment.discussion: Amphidium californicum is distinguished by the linear leaves with notched distal margins. Amphidium lapponicum has decidedly broader leaves and distal cells obscured by large, warty, cuticular papillae.
